page.title: 15 EDUCATION
page.content: {St.Vincent's} is a school for pupils who are deaf, of partial hearing or blind.The roll ia 75approx.The head Teacher is Sister Josephine Rae. {St.Charles'}(Newton) has a roll of 74.It takes its name from the Roman Catholic Church in the village.The head Teacher is Mr.I.Keddilty. {CARMYLE PRIMARY} has a roll of 170 approx. The head Teacher is Mrs. Marion Hughes. {St.JOACHIMS}in Carmyle has a roll of 120 pupils.Its head teacher is Mrs. Maureen Lynch. {MOUNT VERNON PRIMARY}is a semi-open plan circular building with 180 pupils.The head teacher is Miss. Sommerville .There are seven class teachers.The curriculum includes maths,language arts, expressive arts, religious education and physical education.We work hard and are happy.
